src.nu_osc.osc_prob.probability_vacuum

Contents

  • probability_vacuum()

src.nu_osc.osc_prob.probability_vacuum#

src.nu_osc.osc_prob.probability_vacuum(U, beta, E, L=295.0, dm2_21=7.42e-05, dm2_32=0.002517)[source]#

The probability of oscillations of muon neutrino for different energies in vacuum

Parameters:

  • matrix (U - PMNS)

  • electronic (beta - channel of the oscillations (beta=0 -)

  • channel (beta=1 - muonic)

  • channel) (beta=2 - taonic)

  • beam (E - energy of oscillating)

  • oscillations (L - baseline of the)

Returns:

probability of oscillations into given channel beta, at given energy E

Return type:

numpy array
